testcase.name: Custom Logo › should reset logos to default using Reset to Default button

failure.message: TS061_customLogo.spec.js:617:5 should reset logos to default using Reset to Default button

testcase.failure:
[chromium] › TS061_customLogo.spec.js:617:5 › Custom Logo › should reset logos to default using Reset to Default button Error: expect(locator).toBeVisible() failed Locator: getByText('Collapsed', { exact: true }) Expected: visible Received: hidden Timeout: 10000ms Call log: - Expect "toBeVisible" with timeout 10000ms - waiting for getByText('Collapsed', { exact: true }) 12 × locator resolved to

Collapsed

- unexpected value "hidden" 817 | 818 | await collapsedPreviewAfter.scrollIntoViewIfNeeded().catch(() => {}); > 819 | await expect(collapsedPreviewAfter).toBeVisible({ timeout: 10000 }); | ^ 820 | 821 | await expandedPreviewAfter.scrollIntoViewIfNeeded().catch(() => {}); 822 | await expect(expandedPreviewAfter).toBeVisible({ timeout: 10000 }); at C:\cypress-to-playwright-converted\tests\TS061_customLogo.spec.js:819:45 attachment #1: screenshot (image/png) ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ..\test-results\TS061_customLogo-Custom-Lo-e7d94-ing-Reset-to-Default-button-chromium\test-failed-1.png ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── attachment #2: video (video/webm) ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ..\test-results\TS061_customLogo-Custom-Lo-e7d94-ing-Reset-to-Default-button-chromium\video.webm ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Error Context: ..\test-results\TS061_customLogo-Custom-Lo-e7d94-ing-Reset-to-Default-button-chromium\error-context.md
